reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the development of a regulatory framework for renewable energy independent power producers in Indonesia

description.narrative: The project is designed to help Indonesia achieve its clean energy targets by supporting the development of a framework for a regulation on renewable energy independent power producers. This should lead to the generation of opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones, throughout the renewable energy supply chain (e.g. project management, engineering) and across sectors (e.g. marine, solar, geothermal) as the market in Indonesia develops.

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
